name: Organic Vessels
description:
In a world where colossal sea creatures have been tamed and turned into vessels of war for the exploration of the seven seas. You must embark on a journey, fighting shark ships, avoiding sea mines and battle giant king krakens. Every level you can mutate your trusty sea turtle by selecting two different options, and see how far you can get and get the best possible score.

Controls:

W&S to move forward and back

A&D to turn

Click to fire

Esc to pause
